channel.title: Holiday Item Hack
channel.description:
(Sorry if this is the wrong topic, im new here)
Ok, i asked on "moparisthebest" forum about Holiday Item Hacking and they are telling me to go to here.
So you pro hackers! How do I holiday item hack?
Im guessing you have to use a program that kinda make the ppl say or mess with history.
For example:
Regular: "[b]Diango:[/b] Looks like you have no holiday items missing"
Mess with something
Hacked: "[b]Daingo:[/b] It seems your missing the (Item Name Here), here it is"
So how do i hack Holiday Items?

item.title: Holiday Item Hack
item.dc:creator: @mannn mannn
item.description:
@mannn wrote:

Omg. Another hacker? If you try and hack, then you will have a few hackers including me frying your computer. I don’t like hackers that try and cheat in servers. When they hack in servers normally they cause it to crash. Which some hackers did to my server and a friends server.

Read full topic

cheat client mabey, but what youre talking about is server side.
